key.name: backlight-level
key.description: Current backlight level. This is only used as a shared storage, and changing this setting will not do anything.

key.name: backlight-max-alternate
key.summary: Alternate way to specify max brightness
key.description:
Some buggy HALs expect use a different way to set the brightness, and they do it by passing the actual value directly.
Keep this at 0 (disabled) unless you know what you're doing.
